ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Doctors and health care workers sometimes hide information from patients who belong to my ethnic group.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Doctors have the best interests of people of my ethnic group in mind
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group should not confide in doctors and health care workers because it will be used against them.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group should be suspicious of information from doctors and health care workers.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group cannot trust doctors and health care workers.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group should be suspicious of modern medicine.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Doctors and health care workers treat people of my ethnic group like ''guinea pigs.''
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group receive the same medical care from doctors and health care workers as people from other groups.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Doctors and health care workers do not take the medical complaints of people of my ethnic group seriously.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: People of my ethnic group are treated the same as people of other groups by doctors and health care workers.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: In most hospitals, people of different ethnic groups receive the same kind of care.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: I have personally been treated poorly or unfairly by doctors or health care workers because of my ethnicity.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither disagree nor agree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Group-Based Medical Mistrust Scale (GBMMS) - Total Score
Notes: Higher scales indicate more mistrust; Sum of items gbmms_1, 2 (reversed), 3-7, 8 (reversed), 9, 10-11 (reversed), 12

ElementDescription: Group-Based Medical Mistrust Scale (GBMMS) - Suspicion Subscale
Notes: Sum of items gbmms_3-7, 9

ElementDescription: Group-Based Medical Mistrust Scale (GBMMS) - Group Disparities in Health Care Subscale
Notes: Sum of items gbmms_8 (reversed), 10-11 (reversed)

ElementDescription: Group-Based Medical Mistrust Scale (GBMMS) - Lack of Support from Health Care Providers Subscale
Notes: Sum of items gbmms_1, 2 (reversed), 12

ElementDescription: Description of person or group of people about whom participant is answering questions
Notes: e.g., Partner 1, Friend 2, neighbors

I can tell my current standard healthcare provider anything
